main event: Four round red objects were spotted flying southwest at 1000 feet overhead.
interesting points: The objects were described as being the size of a silver dollar at arm's length., The sighting lasted for one minute., The observer thought the objects were an aircraft due to their flight path., The report noted concurrence with the reporting officer that the sighting was likely caused by an aircraft known to be in the area., Weather conditions at the time included broken clouds and scattered clouds.
